verses.name: 1 Chronicles 28:17
verses.text: Also pure gold for the fleshhooks, and the bowls, and the cups: and for the golden basons he gave gold by weight for every bason; and likewise silver by weight for every bason of silver:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 28:18
verses.text: And for the altar of incense refined gold by weight; and gold for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubims, that spread out their wings, and covered the ark of the covenant of the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 28:19
verses.text: All this, said David, the Lord made me understand in writing by his hand upon me, even all the works of this pattern.
